p: A total of 561 Han Chinese patients with PD (62.73 ± 11.74 years) and 491 healthy controls (61.8 ± 8.48 years) were included in the study. The PD and control groups were well matched by age and sex ( Table 1). Among the PD patients, 167 had early-onset PD (EOPD), defined as disease with onset at 50 years; mean age at onset in this group was 44.55 ± 4.90 years. The remaining 394 had late-onset PD (LOPD), and the mean age at onset was 63.76 ± 6.64 years.
